title: PROBLEMS AFTER LOGIN
body:
Hi guys, I was finish the game, then there was ''waiting for the stats'' I clicked X and then talk a bit on the chat and then close the whole game, afer few minutes I was logined into my account a lot of times, and every time I need to reconnect for nothing, game is not exist, I need to reconnect for nothing always, can't see home screen of league of legends just reconnect and always do it for nothing, help me pls, I didn't leave the game so I can't reconnect.. Is dat some bug?THANKS! ALL the Best!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: And when I click reconnect there is writing ''Cannot connect to the server'' and then I need to go out from league of legends, while there is writing dat I will have some penalty if I leave the game.. what is happening??

It sounds like what you experienced is what we refer to as a *Ghost Game*. This happens when the game server for your previous match doesn't properly report the results of the last match to the game platform. It typically won't last longer than a few hours, so let me know if this is still happening to you.
True, it was good after few hours, thanks for replying!
